item.title: Mitigation
item.description: In this research areas, we analyse the exisiting methods of mitigating hate speech and propose newer methods. We are heavily focusing on ideas around developing counter speech as a soultion for hate speech

item.title: Analysis
item.description: We analyse variants of hate and abuse in different platforms. Most recent works from this projects are accepted in CSCW, WebSCI and WWW.

item.title: Detection
item.description: In this part we are focusing on creating better methods for hate speech detection. Two areas we are focusing are Multimodal content and Explanaiblity & Bias in detection system.

item.title: Short is the Road that Leads from Fear to Hate: Fear Speech in Indian WhatsApp Groups
HateXplain: A Benchmark Dataset for Explainable Hate Speech Detection
